greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: The most significant digit in greedy A001563-base (A276326): a(n) = floor(n/A258199(n)), a(0) = 0.
link: Antti Karttunen, Table of n, a(n) for n = 0..4320
mathematica: f[n_] := Block[{a = {{0, n}}}, Do[AppendTo[a, {First@#, Last@#} &@ QuotientRemainder[a[[-1, -1]], (# #!) &[# - i]]], {i, 0, # - 1}] &@ NestWhile[# + 1 &, 0, (# #!) &[# + 1] <= n &]; Rest[a][[All, 1]]]; {0}~Join~Table[First@ f@ n, {n, 96}] (* _Michael De Vlieger_, Aug 31 2016 *)
results.author: _Antti Karttunen_, Aug 30 2016
